text: It seemed weird when I first heard about Watson being used for other tasks since transfer learning is hard stuff, but they probably just trained specific algorithms for tasks like cancer detection.

Oh its progress is unstoppable, so don't worry your silly little heads fretting about it because we take ethics very seriously.' Critical analysis of this narrative suggests that the formula for creating it involves mixing one part fact with three parts self serving corporate cant and one part tech fantasy emitted by geeks who regularly inhale their own exhaust.
